peril.views.slick

Class SlickModelView

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.SlickModelView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelView

    public final class SlickModelView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelView
    This maps model objects to their slick visual representations.
    Since:
    2018-02-28
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli
    See Also:
    ModelView, View
